U

unregisterMessenger(Messenger) - Static method in class com.imaginea.android.sugarcrm.services.SugarService
keeping the messenger in case we go ahead with multiple listeners Activities should unregister in onPause and register in onResume so that they continue to receive messages specific to them, further filtering can be done while sending messages so that unwanted messages are not sent.
